review: I only do test recording with this digitally to get a better Idea of my learning process from the other side. It gives a clean crisp reproduction of every flaw I have.
I bought a 12 string one in blk.  Love it for simplicity and needed it so I didn't have to keep searching for the other.  Got gold to remind me it is for six strings.
good quality for my casual use.  I wouldn't use it on stage because of stability or weight related issues, it's too light.
Great little tuner.  works on everything I own which is 3 acoustics and 1 gretsch hollow body.  Great sensitivity and I love the Metronome built in it as well.

Right product at the right price.  I have 20-25 of these dang things layin around cause I never throw them out.  but never fails I need one I don't have(to drive a zoom pedal to save on batteries), and here it was.
